title: Felix86: Run x86-64 programs on RISC-V Linux
description: Article URL: https://felix86.com/ Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=43864800 Points: 6 # Comments: 1
author: rguiscard
excerpt: Run x86-64 programs on RISC-V Linux
text: felix86 25.05 A lot of progress was made during the month of April! Read More April 2025 update felix86 is a new x86-64 userspace emulator for RISC-V. It is aimed at achieving good performance in games, and as of now is in relatively early development. A few games are already fully working. As this is the first post, we are going to go through a brief introduction. Read More A new x86-64 emulator is on the horizon felix86 is a new x86-64 userspace emulator for RISC-V devices. Read More
html:
felix86 25.05

A lot of progress was made during the month of April!

Read More

April 2025 update

felix86 is a new x86-64 userspace emulator for RISC-V. It is aimed at achieving good performance in games, and as of now is in relatively early development. A few games are already fully working. As this is the first post, we are going to go through a brief introduction.

Read More

A new x86-64 emulator is on the horizon

felix86 is a new x86-64 userspace emulator for RISC-V devices.

Read More
